page.title: 05COURT AND PARK FARMS
page.content: At the first farm the owners grow {barley}and keep{dairy cattle}with a few beef cattle (kept for their daughter).The{milk}is sold to the Milk Marketing Board, and they are not allowed to produce as much as they want to. The farm is 80 acres,and they rent another farm at Itchington, which is 120 acres.They own tractors,fertiliser spreaders and combined harvesters, but they handle all bales by hand. The owners feel that there is a future in farming,and they will continue to make a living from it.They do not have much help;it is more of a {family farm. At the second farm they have recently changed over to{crop farming}in the main,rather than beef farming. They have lived at the farm for 32 years,and the farm is 70 years old.
